question: Create a manifest for a Deployment named 'declarative-deployment' with image 'nginx' and 2 replicas. This manifest will be used to apply the configuration declaratively.
suggested_answer:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: declarative-deployment
spec:
  replicas: 2
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: nginx
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: nginx
    spec:
      containers:
      - name: nginx
        image: nginx
